column5: looking to find a good lake ontario charter for salmon for me and my dad and brother. looking to go in the summertime but just wanted to know ahead of time. any help?  thanks
Look on Spoonpullers lots of guides there.
Depends on location. East or west of Toronto, Niagara?
I know who's boat I'd be on!  http://www.bayofquintewalleyefishing.com/  <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/_iPpDKm96fo" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

http://fishing4tails.com/  greg amiel is a first class guy... and well accomplished tournament angler on lake o...  went for salmon with him 3 years ago... 21 on 17 landed... mostly big chinooks... couple rainbows...  we went mid aughust for the staging spawners
yup. what he said.
Yupper , after the trip four of us had with Lloyd two years ago (everyone of us landed five fish...no, we didn't keep them all...before someone has a hissy fit) no doubt in my mind.
fintastic sportfishing is another good one to check out that operates in the niagara region http://www.fintasticsportfishing.com/

I have been out with several different outfitters mainly on corporate trips with clients.  The best I have found for a trip with lots of fish and professional service is Ryan Hare with "we pound em fishing".  I would recommend him very highly.
I know who's boat I'd be on as well....

I'll second Curryale's recommendation.   I've been out on a bunch of charters (entertaining clients) and hands-down I would recommend Ryan of We Pound 'Em.   Not only has Ryan become a personal friend of mine, he and his crew are very professional and most importantly they are passionate about what they do so an amazing day is almost a given.   Last trip out my clients had the time of their lives with the highlight being a fish that was in the top ten of the week in the Great Ontario Salmon Derby.
another vote for FINtastic Sportfishing  http://www.fintasticsportfishing.com/  Shane is excellent to deal with and a pleasure to fish with.
You are... just to the right of the ugly belly!
PM sent
I like this guy The best on the Big O
Man, there are some real boilers in that video... heck, Lloyd's belly makes FnS's look small! OP, Lloyd's awesome and I am sure you would enjoy a day out with him! HH
I did notice that but didn't want to embarrass Lloyd....
X3, class act and catches fish! Looking to book with him myself at the end of June

X 4  have had the distinct pleasure of Being Aboard Ryan Hare's old boat-targeting Salmon  and young Shane out of Oakville   Lots of good Captains on LO  Personally---We Pound-Em is my go to guy if we are not navigating our own boat   Have a good weekend All   Cheers    Paul
I Agree with this as well !! Ryans a great guide and works hard out there , already booked wih him again this season
I agree with Wayne. Lloyd is awesome to fish with.

Wow! Thanks everyone for the great referrals   really looking forward to seeing everyone again this year. Looks like it's going to be an amazing summer with some really big fish  Just getting ready to rig out the new ride, 3250 pursuit. Heres a shot from when I picked her up end of last season.  tightlines  Ryan Hare
Ryan that is a sweet look pursuit bro. Nice job, it looks sweet. Can;t wait to see it in action.

Check Out the Ontario Sportfishing Guides Association website  OSGA  www.ontariofishcharters.ca  All the members are Proffesional Charter Operators with the proper training and safety standards to provide you with a successful and safe day on the water.  There are many outfits on Lake Ontario as well as all the other Big lakes and regions of the province.  GL
